name: Escape from the castle of ghosts
name_original: Escape from the castle of ghosts
description:
Escape from the castle of ghosts This is simple game where you need to escape from a castle. In game you can move on AWSD or arrows from keyboard or left stick or D-pad from gamepad. Also you use space or A (on gamepad) to start and end game and esc or B (on gamepad) to close game.

Game is under GPL v3 license
